data.eml:eml: Description of Cathorops manglarensis, a new species from the Colombian Pacific, with redescription of Cathorops multiradiatus (Siluriformes, Ariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marceniuk, Alexandre P. (2007): Description of Cathorops manglarensis, a new species from the Colombian Pacific, with redescription of Cathorops multiradiatus (Siluriformes, Ariidae). Zootaxa 1529: 33-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177638
